epidemic.progpracticum.model

Class AbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • epidemic.progpracticum.model.AbstractEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bird, Human

    public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing simulation object.
    Version:
    Autumn 2013
    Author:
    Monika

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractEntity

        public AbstractEntity(char aSpecies,
              boolean aSick,
              int aDayNum,
              java.awt.Point aLocation)
        Parameterized constructor that sets object's state to parameters passed.
        Parameters:
        aSpecies - is a character denoting the species
        aSick - is a boolean value denoting whether the object is sick or not
        aDayNum - >= 0, the number of days the object has been sick
        aLocation - is the location of the object in the world, 0 <= x < world width, 0 <= y < world height

    • Method Detail

      • isSick

        public boolean isSick()
        Shows whether the object is sick or healthy.
        Returns:
        is true if object is sick, false otherwise

      • setMyIsSick

        public void setMyIsSick(boolean aSick)
        Changes the state of object's health to sick or healthy.
        Parameters:
        aSick - is a boolean value indicating whether an object should be sick or not

      • getMySpecies

        public char getMySpecies()
        Gets objects's species.
        Returns:
        is a character indicating object's species

        is a Point indicating object's location in the world

      • setMyLocation

        public void setMyLocation(java.awt.Point aLocation)
        Changes the object's location in the world.
        Parameters:
        aLocation - is the location in the world, 0 <= x < world width, 0 <= y < world height

      • getMyDaysSick

        public int getMyDaysSick()
        Gets the number of days the object has been sick.
        Returns:
        is an integer indicating the number of days the object has been sick

      • setMyDaysSick

        public void setMyDaysSick(int aDaysSick)
        Changes the number of days the object has been sick.
        Parameters:
        aDaysSick - >=0 is the new number of days

      • move

        public abstract java.awt.Point move()
        Abstract method - moves object's location in the world according to object's species movement rules.
        Returns:
        The new Location of the Individual.

      • compareToEquals

        public void compareToEquals(AbstractEntity anE,
                   java.util.List<java.awt.Point> aPointList)
        Compares two entities locations and checks if they are going to be sick.
        Parameters:
        anE - is the abstract entity to be comparing (either a human or a bird).
        aPointList - is the list of sick points.
